permissions.usageDescription: To get you the best audio we recommend connecting to a wireless device.
To view, play, and experience your music with spotify, please enable access to your music library.
While you are not in the application you can still listen to music.
WiFi will help get you the best quality audio.
Control what you lisent to with the sound of your voice.

name: Scarlet
subtitle: Get more than an app store. Get Scarlet.
localizedDescription:
NOTE: The developer does not change the version (1.0), so if you see new features online or if the app stops working, uninstall and reinstall the app. The download link on AltStore is from the official website so what you download here will always be the latest.

Also, getting scarlet from AltStore means that you will never lose the app if you keep refreshing - downloading it from the official website will likely result in the certificate being revoked and you have to wait for it to be resigned.


Why Us?

Scarlet offers a new community for developers to submit their paid apps, allowing users to seamlessly protect themselves from revokes. Our goal getting into Scarlet is to give everybody access to a store that doesn't tell people to do the workarounds. Instead, we created an app with every user in mind to bring a smooth experience.


True repo system

Scarlet offers the first ever true repo system for all users.
What is a true repo system ? - Our repo system supports jailbreak repos and jailed users can make use of some features added to the side.
These include 1. Force install jailbroken apps while jailed
2. Automatically/Manually injects the tweak into the app it's meant for(no jailbreak required)

We include native repos specifically designed for Scarlet. Developers have the ability to choose a dylibs/debs to inject into the specificed app.
 

Made by Pros

Scarlet's GUI was designed by Xeviks.
He has brought color, vibrancy, movement, and modernity - yet keeping the look simplistic.
DebianArch is the solo-dev of the Scarlet app and is bringing innovative features to reshape the community that was left unchanged.
versionDescription:
• Added Ability to import/Export app backups.
• Added ability to modify IPA (Add/Remove Tweaks etc.)
